00066 class CFileStatistic
00067 {
00068     friend class CKnownFile;
00069     friend class CKnownFilesRem;
00070 
00071 public:
00072     CFileStatistic();
00073     void    AddRequest();
00074     void    AddAccepted();
00075     void    AddTransferred(uint64 bytes);
00076     uint16  GetRequests() const         {return requested;}
00077     uint16  GetAccepts() const          {return accepted;}
00078     uint64  GetTransferred() const          {return transferred;}
00079     uint32  GetAllTimeRequests() const      {return alltimerequested;}
00080     void    SetAllTimeRequests(uint32 new_value)    { alltimerequested = new_value; };
00081     uint32  GetAllTimeAccepts() const       {return alltimeaccepted;}
00082     void    SetAllTimeAccepts(uint32 new_value) { alltimeaccepted = new_value; };
00083     uint64  GetAllTimeTransferred() const       {return alltimetransferred;}
00084     void    SetAllTimeTransferred(uint64 new_value) { alltimetransferred = new_value; };
00085     CKnownFile* fileParent;
00086 
00087 private:
00088     uint16 requested;
00089     uint64 transferred;
00090     uint16 accepted;
00091     uint32 alltimerequested;
00092     uint64 alltimetransferred;
00093     uint32 alltimeaccepted;
00094 };

00105 class CAbstractFile
00106 {
00107 public:
00108     CAbstractFile();
00109     explicit CAbstractFile(const CAbstractFile& other);
00110     virtual ~CAbstractFile() {}
00111 
00112     const CPath&    GetFileName() const { return m_fileName; }
00113     const CMD4Hash& GetFileHash() const { return m_abyFileHash; }
00114 
00115     uint64  GetFileSize() const { return m_nFileSize;}
00116     bool    IsLargeFile() const { return m_nFileSize > (uint64)OLD_MAX_FILE_SIZE; }
00117 
00118     virtual void SetFileSize(uint64 nFileSize)  { m_nFileSize = nFileSize; }
00119     virtual void SetFileName(const CPath& filename);
00120 
00121     /* Tags and Notes handling */
00122     uint32 GetIntTagValue(uint8 tagname) const;
00123     uint32 GetIntTagValue(const wxString& tagname) const;
00124     bool GetIntTagValue(uint8 tagname, uint32& ruValue) const;
00125     const wxString& GetStrTagValue(uint8 tagname) const;
00126     const wxString& GetStrTagValue(const wxString& tagname) const;
00127     const CTag *GetTag(const wxString& tagname) const;
00128     const CTag *GetTag(const wxString& tagname, uint8 tagtype) const;
00129     const CTag *GetTag(uint8 tagname) const;
00130     const CTag *GetTag(uint8 tagname, uint8 tagtype) const;
00131     void AddTagUnique(const CTag &pTag);
00132     const ArrayOfCTag& GetTags() const { return m_taglist; }
00133     void AddNote(Kademlia::CEntry* pEntry);
00134     const CKadEntryPtrList& getNotes() const { return m_kadNotes; }
00135 
00136     /* Comment and rating */
00137     virtual const wxString& GetFileComment() const { return m_strComment; }
00138     virtual int8    GetFileRating()         const { return m_iRating; }
00139 
00140     bool    HasComment() const      { return m_hasComment; }
00141     bool    HasRating() const       { return (m_iUserRating != 0); }
00142     int8    UserRating() const      { return m_iUserRating; }
00143 
00144 protected:
00146     CAbstractFile& operator=(const CAbstractFile);
00147 
00148     CMD4Hash    m_abyFileHash;
00149     // comment/rating are read from the config and cached in these variables,
00150     // so make the mutable to allow GetFileComment() to be a const method
00151     mutable wxString    m_strComment;
00152     mutable int8        m_iRating;
00153     bool        m_hasComment;
00154     int8        m_iUserRating;
00155     ArrayOfCTag m_taglist;
00156     CKadEntryPtrList m_kadNotes;
00157 
00158 private:
00159     uint64      m_nFileSize;
00160     CPath       m_fileName;
00161 };

00168 class CKnownFile : public CAbstractFile, public CECID
00169 {
00170 friend class CHashingTask;
00171 public:
00172     CKnownFile();

00175

00180 
00181     // virtual functions for CKnownFile and CPartFile:
00182     virtual bool    IsPartFile() const  {return false;}     // true if not completed
00183     virtual bool    IsCompleted() const { return true; }    // true if completed
00184     virtual bool    IsCPartFile() const { return false; }   // true if it's a CPartFile
00185 
00186     virtual bool    LoadFromFile(const CFileDataIO* file);  //load date, hashset and tags from a .met file
00187     virtual uint8   GetStatus(bool WXUNUSED(ignorepause) = false) const { return PS_COMPLETE; }
00188     bool    WriteToFile(CFileDataIO* file);
00189     time_t GetLastChangeDatetime() const { return m_lastDateChanged; }
00190     void SetLastChangeDatetime(time_t t) { m_lastDateChanged = t; }
00191 
00192     virtual void SetFileSize(uint64 nFileSize);
00193 
00194     // local available part hashs
00195     size_t  GetHashCount() const    {return m_hashlist.size();}
00196     const CMD4Hash& GetPartHash(uint16 part) const;
00197 
00198     // nr. of part hashs according the file size wrt ED2K protocol
00199     uint32  GetED2KPartHashCount() const { return m_iED2KPartHashCount; }
00200 
00201     // nr. of 9MB parts (file data)
00202     inline uint16 GetPartCount() const { return m_iPartCount; }
00203 
00204     // nr. of 9MB parts according the file size wrt ED2K protocol (OP_FILESTATUS)
00205     inline uint16 GetED2KPartCount() const { return m_iED2KPartCount; }
00206 
00207     // size of a certain part, last is different, all others are PARTSIZE
00208     uint32 GetPartSize(uint16 part) const { return part == m_iPartCount - 1 ? m_sizeLastPart : PARTSIZE; }
00209
